ymm_app.replacement_part_txt: This is a replacement part for a product in our range. This item is not vehicle-specific or universal. Please read the product description for installation details.
ymm_app.uni_but_no_ymm_txt: This is a Universal Fit Item. It is designed to fit many vehicles. Universal products may require a vehicle-specific fit kit (sold separately) or other modifications for installation. Universal products are not guaranteed to fit every vehicle. Check the product description for installation requirements.

ymm_app.ymm_comp_hdr_uni_fit: This is a Universal Fit Item. It is designed to fit many vehicles. Universal products may require a vehicle-specific fit kit (sold separately) or other modifications for installation. Universal products are not guaranteed to fit every vehicle.
